
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VCountUp.cpp
          VCountUp.h
          VCountUp__Syms.cpp
          VCountUp__Syms.h
  DEPENDS CountUp.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} -Wall -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CountUp.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VCountUp STATIC VCountUp.cpp VCountUp__Syms.cpp
    CountUp.v
)

target_compile_options(VCountUp PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VCountUp PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VCountUp verilated)
